name: Pseudo-Harvest
description:
Game Play

Pseudo-Harvest is a simple puzzle game.

You need to drag some stuff into the granary, and cover its surface with grain.

Make sure the lowest level of grain surface above the Harvest Line

Background

Its concept bases on a bureaucratic society based on a planned economy

You, as a farmer in Harvest Village, farming on a barren land, can only produce limited grain. 

However, officials do not expect this ordinary result. They need some honorable achievements, at any cost.

They want to see a bumper HARVEST.

To survive in this extreme society, you have cheat.

DECEIVE

Hide sundries beneath grain, to make it look like a full granary.

Be careful, do not be caught FAKING
